claim.description: The statement or claim about a billionaire to be verified.
The original claim that was evaluated.

verified.description: True if the claim is verified as accurate, false otherwise.

confidence.description: Confidence level in the verification result.

notes.description: Brief explanation or source references supporting the verification.
